bibl.title: Greek Shorthand Manuals. Syllabary and Commentary Edited from Papyri and Waxed Tablets in the British Museum and from the Antinoë Papyri in the Possession of the Egypt Exploration Society.
bibl.seg: Milne H.J.M., Greek Shorthand Manuals. Syllabary and Commentary Edited from Papyri and Waxed Tablets in the British Museum and from the Antinoë Papyri in the Possession of the Egypt Exploration Society. (Graeco-Roman Memoirs. 24.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1934, 4°, vii-79 pp. et 9 pll.

C.R. par Paul Collart, RPhil. 3e s., 10 (1936) pp. 387-388. - Carlo Gallavotti, RFil N.S., 15 (1937) pp. 94-95. - Marcel Hombert, ChrEg 10 (1935) No. 20, pp. 387-388; RBPhil 14 (1935) pp. 1161-1162. - Arthur Mentz, GGA 197 (1935) pp. 481-487; Gnomon 12 (1936) pp. 490-496; PhilWoch 55 (1935) coll. 627-634. - C.H. Roberts, CR 50 (1936) pp. 24-25. - C.H.V.S., JHS 55 (1935) pp. 252-253. - Ulrich Wilcken, ArchPF 11 (1935) p. 314. - Fr. Zucker, BZ 35 (1935) pp. 170-171.
